question: The administration has successfully (　　　　) the terrorist organization.
The prime minister was criticized for his (　　　) interference in the elections to be held today.
It took more than eight years to confirm the truth of Professor Mochizuki’s paper due to the (　　　) nature of the theory.
Many drugs that cause (　　　) are subject to regulation due to their addictive nature.
The magazine has long been enthusiastically supported by (　　　) readers for its accurate commentary.
The woman who accepted the offer on the street corner was (　　　) by the possibility of making a lot of money right away.
The prosecutor presented (　　　) evidence that the woman had hacked into the server and leaked customer information.
